Articles.Content: Do y’all know of any decent headset with mic? I prefer wireless. Any recommendations?

12 hours ago, Cloakedwand72 said:

Do y’all know of any decent headset with mic? I prefer wireless. Any recommendations?

I can't speak for the mic, as I really haven't used it much, but the logitech G33 is really nice.   True over the ear (Not on the ear), good sound quality, wireless, stowable flexible boom mic, and it comes with a long enough cord that when you do run low on charge, it's not very cumbersome to charge and use at the same time. 

Edited November 5, 2022 by Gargamel

8 hours ago, Gargamel said:

I can't speak for the mic, as I really haven't used it much, but the logitech G33 is really nice.   True over the ear (Not on the ear), good sound quality, wireless, stowable flexible boom mic, and it comes with a long enough cord that when you do run low on charge, it's not very cumbersome to charge and use at the same time. 

I’ll check it out! Does it work for PC/Switch/Game systems/IOS devices?
It’s PC.  I believe it runs through the standard Logitech proprietary dongle, so I have no idea about other platforms.

On 11/5/2022 at 11:05 PM, Gargamel said:

It’s PC.  I believe it runs through the standard Logitech proprietary dongle, so I have no idea about other platforms.   

The dongle could be both a pro and a con. Means it’s 100% wireless connection.
